name: On a ROLL (itch) (Evan Polekoff)
description:
Rate the Game Here: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1621620

You're hungry and all you want to do is make a simple sandwich, but in Dice Town, even the most mundane interactions are handled through dice rolls.

Explore the town and find the ingredients you need to make your perfect sandwich before you waste your entire lunch break!
